description: Search songs, albums, and artists on YouTube Music. Manage your library and playlists end-to-end: create, edit, and organize tracks. Generate smart, personalized playlists and analyze your taste profile to discover new music.

capabilities.name: search_songs
capabilities.description: Search for songs on YouTube Music. Returns structured JSON with song title, album, artist, year, and video ID.

capabilities.name: search_albums
capabilities.description: Search for albums on YouTube Music. Returns album name, artist, year, and browse ID.

capabilities.name: search_artists
capabilities.description: Search for artists on YouTube Music. Returns artist name, browse ID, and thumbnails.

capabilities.name: get_song_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed information about a specific song by video ID. Returns title, artist, album, duration, and thumbnails.

capabilities.name: get_album_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed album information including all tracks, year, and artist. Use browse_id from search results.

capabilities.name: get_artist_info
capabilities.description: Get detailed artist information including top songs. Use browse_id from search results.

capabilities.name: get_library_songs
capabilities.description: Get the user's liked songs from their YouTube Music library. Returns structured JSON with song details.

capabilities.name: get_playlists
capabilities.description: Get the user's playlists from YouTube Music library. Returns playlist name, ID, and track count as structured JSON.

capabilities.name: get_playlist_details
capabilities.description: Get detailed playlist information including all tracks with song, album, artist, and duration.

capabilities.name: create_playlist
capabilities.description: Create a new YouTube Music playlist. Returns the new playlist ID.

capabilities.name: edit_playlist
capabilities.description: Edit playlist metadata (name, description, privacy). Only provide fields you want to change.

capabilities.name: delete_playlist
capabilities.description: Delete a playlist from YouTube Music. This action cannot be undone.

capabilities.name: add_songs_to_playlist
capabilities.description: Add one or more songs to an existing playlist. Supports batch operations for efficiency.

capabilities.name: remove_songs_from_playlist
capabilities.description: Remove one or more songs from a playlist. Requires setVideoId (not videoId) from playlist track data.

capabilities.name: start_smart_playlist
capabilities.description: Start an interactive smart playlist creation session. Returns session ID to use with other smart playlist tools.

capabilities.name: add_seed_artist
capabilities.description: Add an artist to influence smart playlist recommendations. Looks up artist in MusicBrainz and retrieves tags.

capabilities.name: add_seed_track
capabilities.description: Add a specific track as a seed for smart playlist recommendations.

capabilities.name: refine_recommendations
capabilities.description: Adjust recommendation parameters: exclude artists, prefer/avoid tags, set diversity level.

capabilities.name: get_recommendations
capabilities.description: Generate playlist recommendations based on seeds and refinement settings. Searches YouTube Music for tracks.

capabilities.name: preview_playlist
capabilities.description: Preview the smart playlist before creating it. Shows all tracks and session details.

capabilities.name: create_smart_playlist
capabilities.description: Create the smart playlist on YouTube Music with all recommended tracks.

capabilities.name: get_user_taste_profile
capabilities.description: Analyze user's liked songs to build a taste profile with top tags, artists, and genres.

capabilities.name: get_auth_status
capabilities.description: Check authentication status and get OAuth URL if not authenticated. After authenticating via the returned URL, the session becomes active automatically.

capabilities.name: get_server_status
capabilities.description: Get server health, version, uptime, and rate limit status.
